com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget
Class WPPivotHeader

java.lang.Object
  android.view.ViewGroup
      com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget.ViewGroup
          com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget.FrameLayout
              com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget.WPPivotHeader

public class WPPivotHeader
extends FrameLayout

The header of a WPPivotControl that displays children horizontally but clips them if they go off screen. The children are WPTextViews all of the same color except the left most child, mMiddleView which is a different color because it represents the currently displayed tab. Scrolling is handled by WPPivotControl, however styles as well as child events are handled in this view.

This layout should ONLY be used as part of WPPivotControl.
Change Log:
v1.01

  • Previous and next header (no longer scaled by smallest of previous and current)
v1.02
  • Ensure that headers are drawn at the correct position after scrolling, regardless the pace.
  • Overriden dispatchDraw, only drawing the children that are visible (and one child leftward).
  • Uses WPTheme.isDark to test for a dark/ light theme.
v1.03
  • Controllable left-padding using setPivotPaddingLeft.

Since:
16-03-2012
